5th International Workshop on

Search-Based Software Testing

21st April, 2012, Montreal, Canada

In conjunction with ICST 2012

IEEE International Conference on Testing, Verification and Validation

Welcome & Call for papers | Important Dates | Paper Submission | Prizes | Program Committee | Keynote | Program | Sponsors | ICST 2012

We will continue the SBST tradition and present a prize (€300) for the best paper presented at the workshop. This year's prize is sponsored by Swell, the Swedish Research School in Software Verification and Validation.


If you have any queries, please contact the program chairs: Kiran Lakhotia email: k.lakhotia (at) cs.ucl.ac.uk or Wasif Afzal email: wasif.afzal (at) bth.se
